field.name: summary
field.value: Resolve<T>(IDictionary) will not override ctor args; only optional property args.

field.name: description
field.value:
When using the Resolve<T>(IDictionary) method, it was noticed that ctor args cannot be overridden at runtime, unlike properties. Issue was originally found in 1.0.3.433, but also verified on latest trunk (2.0). There is no documentation indicating that this method will _only_ override optional args, therefore this is either unexpected behavior for the given method, or an actual bug.
If this is by-design, a possible suggestion would be to change the name of this method's argument name to indicate the IDictionary is _only_ for optional (property) args. However, I would hope this is a bug, since the runtime overriding of ctor args can be an extremely useful feature.
